A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The worst Star Wars movie to date. Honestly\, there was nothing shocking or jaw dropping that really occurred in my opinion. It was as if Rian Johnson knew what every Star Wars fan wanted to see but instead chose to go with some mediocre story of how the lines of good and evil can be blurry. Not to mention\, the acting was\, at times\, terrible and at points the film was absolutely cheesy. This was Jar Jar Binks bad.
